services.title: Computer Scientist
services.desc: Having trained in CS during my undergraduate I understand a wide range of its fundamentals. I also specialised in HCI, AI, Software Engineering and Data visualision.

services.title: Software Design and Architecture
services.desc: In reading my masters I sharpend my skills in software systems design, development and implementation. This is demonstraited through distinctions in my projects.

services.title: Software Team Mananagment
services.desc: Throughout my student career I have lead and managed many software teams. For example, as Web Editor of the Saint, as Team leader of IBM and Intel industry exchange projects. Each team I have lead results in high award, most recently being published to Gosh Conference 2020.

services.title: Creative Design
services.desc: Throughout my degrees, during my research internship at St Andrews and as an Innovation Scientist intern at Medidata, I have push my minds creativity to help develop new innovative projects. Often with high regards.
